entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cowichan 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: SSE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets this morning then to periods of freezing rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
